name: I am not a murderer
description:
You have being reincarnated as a 2d character. You have a gun and you can not stop firing (you're firing in loop), but you want to save as many people as possible, will you be able to do it?

Use the arrow keys to change the directory of your aiming.

Entry to ludum dare 47, themed "stuck on a loop".
I'll try to improve it in the future. (The idea should be there tho).
